mapper.insert: insert into `board`(title, content, type, memberId, dongCode, hit, createdTime) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{memberId}, #{dongCode}, 0, now())
mapper.select: select boardid, title, content, type, memberid, dongcode, hit, createdtime, updatedtime from board where type = 1 and deletedtime is null order by boardId desc
select boardid, title, content, type, memberid, dongcode, hit, createdtime, updatedtime from board where type = 0 and dongCode = #{dongCode} and deletedtime is null order by boardId desc;
